name: Dice Cave
description:
Fight with enemies in cave. Earn points and don't die!
Dice is deciding how many moves you can do. If you collide with a enemy you will kill it, but if you run out moves enemies will attack you. Every enemy have patern where they move. Learn it to avoid them or kill them! The longer you play the greater number of opponents trying to kill you!

Contols:
WSAD-move
